languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, корабельные орудия в полной боевой готовности. Станция хорошо укреплена, и ее обитатели наверняка попытаются дать отпор, но мы — сильнее. Прикажете атаковать рассадник генетической мерзости?"

"Lord Cap'n, the ship's cannons are fully primed. The station is well fortified and its inhabitants will probably attempt to fight back, but we are stronger. Do you command we attack this hotbed of genetic aberration?"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, корабельные орудия в полной боевой готовности. Станция хорошо укреплена, и ее обитатели наверняка попытаются дать отпор, но мы — сильнее. Прикажете атаковать рассадник генетической мерзости?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, the ship's cannons are fully primed. The station is well fortified and its inhabitants will probably attempt to fight back, but we are stronger. Shall we attack the hotbed of genetic anathema?"

"Lord Captain, the ship's cannons are fully primed. The station is well fortified and its inhabitants will probably attempt to fight back, but we are stronger. Shall we attack the hotbed of genetic anathema?"

"Lord Cap'n, the ship's cannons are fully primed. The station is well fortified and its inhabitants will probably attempt to fight back, but we are stronger. Do you command we attack this hotbed of genetic aberration?"

languages.text: "Lord Cap'n, die Kanonen des Schiffs sind feuerbereit. Die Station ist gut befestigt und ihre Bewohner werden vermutlich zurückschlagen, aber wir sind stärker. Sollen wir diese Brutstätte genetischer Abscheulichkeit angreifen?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the ship's cannons are fully primed. The station is well fortified and its inhabitants will probably attempt to fight back, but we are stronger. Do you command we attack this hotbed of genetic aberration?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Cap'n, die Kanonen des Schiffs sind feuerbereit. Die Station ist gut befestigt und ihre Bewohner werden vermutlich zurückschlagen, aber wir sind stärker. Sollen wir diese Brutstätte genetischer Abscheulichkeit angreifen?"

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-cap'taine|Seigneure-cap'taine}, les canons du vaisseau sont parés à faire feu. La station est bien fortifiée et ses habitants tenteront sûrement de riposter, mais ils ne sont pas de taille à nous résister. Un mot de votre part, et nous raserons ce repaire d'aberrations génétiques. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the ship's cannons are fully primed. The station is well fortified and its inhabitants will probably attempt to fight back, but we are stronger. Do you command we attack this hotbed of genetic aberration?"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-cap'taine|Seigneure-cap'taine}, les canons du vaisseau sont parés à faire feu. La station est bien fortifiée et ses habitants tenteront sûrement de riposter, mais ils ne sont pas de taille à nous résister. Un mot de votre part, et nous raserons ce repaire d'aberrations génétiques. »

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, los cañones de la nave están a punto. La estación está fortificada y es probable que sus habitantes presenten batalla, pero somos más fuertes. ¿Da su orden para atacar este antro de aberraciones genéticas?».
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the ship's cannons are fully primed. The station is well fortified and its inhabitants will probably attempt to fight back, but we are stronger. Do you command we attack this hotbed of genetic aberration?"

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, los cañones de la nave están a punto. La estación está fortificada y es probable que sus habitantes presenten batalla, pero somos más fuertes. ¿Da su orden para atacar este antro de aberraciones genéticas?».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、船のキャノンは準備万端です。ステーションは要塞化されており、住民は反撃を試みるでしょうが、我々の方が強い。この忌まわしきものの温床への攻撃をご命令なさいますか？」
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the ship's cannons are fully primed. The station is well fortified and its inhabitants will probably attempt to fight back, but we are stronger. Do you command we attack this hotbed of genetic aberration?"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、船のキャノンは準備万端です。ステーションは要塞化されており、住民は反撃を試みるでしょうが、我々の方が強い。この忌まわしきものの温床への攻撃をご命令なさいますか？」

languages.text: “船长老大，船上的大炮都准备好了。这座星站戒备森严，这里的人可能会打算反抗，但我们的武器更厉害。要不要下令攻击这个孕育基因怪物的温床？”
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the ship's cannons are fully primed. The station is well fortified and its inhabitants will probably attempt to fight back, but we are stronger. Do you command we attack this hotbed of genetic aberration?"

traits.locale_text: “船长老大，船上的大炮都准备好了。这座星站戒备森严，这里的人可能会打算反抗，但我们的武器更厉害。要不要下令攻击这个孕育基因怪物的温床？”

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, gemi topları hazır. İstasyon iyi tahkim edilmiş, sakinleri de muhtemelen karşı saldırıya geçmeyi deneyecek. Fakat biz daha güçlüyüz. Bu genetik sapkı yuvasına saldırmamızı mı emrediyorsunuz?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the ship's cannons are fully primed. The station is well fortified and its inhabitants will probably attempt to fight back, but we are stronger. Do you command we attack this hotbed of genetic aberration?"
